attributes.action: Enforce the Law regarding cyclists and their cycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All cyclists should obey the law and be fined for the following:
Going through Red lights.
Riding on pavements.
going down one way streets the wrong way.
riding at night with no lights.
having no regard for the highway code.
not indicating when changing direction.
riding more than two abreast.
to have number plates for identification for when they break the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
